title: Competitor Intelligence: Market Domination Through Data
author: Ekobol Intelligence Unit

p1: In cutthroat e-commerce, flying blind is suicide. Competitor Spy gives you X-ray vision into rivals' pricing strategies, stock levels, and sales velocity. This isn't stalking—it's strategic intelligence gathering from publicly available data.
p2: Monitor competitor pricing strategies in real-time.

p12: Competitor Spy turns uncertainty into calculated risk. When you know their next move before they make it, you've already won.
